item.description:
Date: Thursday, October 22, 2007
Time: 5:30 to 8:00 p.m.
Location: GoNOMAD Cafe, South Deerfield, Massachusetts
Refreshments Provided: Chips, dips, hors d'oeuvres, soda, and wine.
Suggested Donation: $5 to defray cost of refreshments



Join your fellow HT-ers at the GoNOMAD Cafe in South Deerfield, where there are computers we can use, drinks to be drunk, and no obligation networking to be had!



It's the perfect place for an HT life with WiFi, strong coffee and lunch during the day but we clear out the chairs and get down to networking at these fun sip and socials here at night. Join us after work for a sip and a schmooze at GoNOMAD Cafe in South Deerfield, Thursday, October 22 at 5:30 pm. $5 at the door. GoNOMAD caf√© is located in the center of South Deerfield across from the Town Common. For more information go to wwww.GoNOMADcafe.com.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Hidden Tech Sip and Schmooze
